resources.string: Something went wrong. Please try again.
We need your permission to read your device identification number. We use this number to keep you notified.
We need your permission to record your device identification number. We use this number to keep you notified.
We only need your device id to keep you notified about booking progress and other changes. \n Go to Settings > Apps > JaiHo > Permissions
Account created successfully. Enjoy our services.
Select who will do pooja arrangements?

Welcome...Your account creation is in progress. Please take following steps to work with us. 
1. Send your recent photo and photo of your Id-proof (Id with address and your photograph) to JaiHoPanditJi@gmail.com 
2. Get a police verification certificate which is required to work in any company to provide your services. 
3. In the end we will provide you one unique password, that you can use here to login to your account. 
4. Our support team will always stay in contact to assist you through the process. Thank you.
Priest will do arrangements for pooja
I will do arrangements for pooja
No network access. Please check your internet connection and try again.
No account found for this combination, Please create an account.
Wrong password. Please retry or go to forgot password.
No account with this number. Please create an account
An account already exist with this phone number. Please try login.
Password updated successfully. Try login to your account.
We do not provide services in past time.
Please select time at least 1 hour ahead.
Sorry, We are currently active in India only. To get the right address, please click on location symbol and go to map.
Please offer a genuine amount for dakshina.
Please select who will make arrangements for pooja.
Pleases select any time at least 3 hours ahead. Time is needed for preparation.
Booking Successful. We will notify you shortly when a priest accepts the request.
Sorry, booking is not allowed twice on same day for same pooja.
No internet access, please check your internet connections and try again.
To enter address, GPS is required.
JaiHo uses GPS to get you a valid address on map. To enable it go to settings and give permission.
